physical_appearance: This is a multicoloured engraving of a Dutch man-of-war. The top portion of the print is richly illustrated and contains textual information, in German,on the schematics of a fully-rigged three-masted Dutch man-of-war with 96 guns. The bottom portion of the print holds information about the hierarchy of the crew on board, from the highest officer to the lowest servant.
sgcool_label_text: This print of a fully-rigged three-masted Dutch man-of-war provides a schematic of its exterior and interior, including a view of its cross-section as well as illustrations of typical navigational instruments used, accompanied by descriptions of their use. In addition, a full listing of the typical hierarchy of the crew on board is provided.
